participant_1.background:
I'm not a morning person, but I love reading mystery novels.
i am recently divorced.
i listen to podcasts.
i like to fly kites.
i daydream about cafes in paris.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy the sensation of my back being scratched, but not saliva.
i am a huge buffalo bills fan , and our family has season tickets.
i own a small farm where i herd cattle.
i am a hopeless romantic.
I remember playing with my pet fox in the backyard when I was a child.

content.text: Hello, what are you interested in?
I'm a huge buffalo bills fan and I love listening to podcasts.
Nice, I'm not much of a sports fan myself but I love listening to podcasts as well!
What podcasts do you like to listen to?
I listen to a lot of true crime podcasts, but I also like some comedy podcasts too.
I've been meaning to get into true crime podcasts but I haven't found one that I really like yet.
You should check out "My Favorite Murder"! It's one of my favorites.
Okay, I'll check it out! What do you like about it?
I like that it's funny and informative at the same time. The hosts are also really great.
That sounds good, I'll definitely check it out.
What are some of your other interests?
I love to fly kites and I like to daydream about cafes in Paris.
Kite flying sounds like fun! I've never actually tried it before.
You should give it a try! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to get outside.
I might have to try that sometime.
Well, I'm glad you're a Bills fan! It's always good to meet a fellow fan.
Me too! We should go to a game sometime!
